text:
NAEB REGION II CONFERENCE
PRELIMINARY PROGRAM
March 29-30, 1963
Regional TV Director - Gerard L. Appy
Regional Radio Director - Leonard Press
Regional Conference Host - R. LeRoy Lastinger
Friday, March 29
(All Friday events at the International Inn, Tampa)
REGISTRATION
9:00 - 12:00 A.M. Lobby
LUNCHEON
12:00 - 1:30 P.M. Crystal Room
Speaker: Richard Hull, Director, WOSU, Columbus, Ohio
CONFERENCE SESSIONS
2:00 - 5:00 P.M.
RADIO (2:00 - 3:00 P.M. only)
Chairman: Kenneth Wright, Director of Broadcasting
University of Tennessee
TELEVISION
Engineering
Chairman: William Kessler, Consulting Engineer
Florida ETV Commission
General Audience ETV Appeal
Chairman: John Young, Director of Television
WUNC-TV, University of North Carolina
Formal Instruction
Chairman: R. LeRoy Lastinger, General Manager, WEDU
Public Relations
Chairman: Louis Peneguy, Director of Coordination and
Information, Alabama ETV Commission
SOCIAL HOUR
5:30 - 6:30 P.M. Pool Side Patio
BANQUET
7:30 - 9:00 P.M. Crystal Eoom
Speaker: Dr. John T. Caldwell, Chancellor
North Carolina State College
Chapel Hill, North Carolina
Saturday, March 50
NAEB PROFESSIONAL ASSOCIATION BREAKFAST
8:00 - 9:00 A.M. Golden Triangle Room
Speakers: William G. Harley, President, NAEB
Leonard Press, Chairman, NAEB Radio Board
Gerard Appy, TV Director, Region II NAEB
